item.title: Render LaTeX using KaTeX
item.description: Enable katex by adding katex = "true" to the front matter +++ katex = "true" +++ It’s almost a dropin alternative to the mathjax solution,you should just choose one of them. Inline math looks like this This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} =1$ This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1$ and with math blocks: $$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} =1$$ $$ \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1 $$ This is using [ ] \\( \\) code delimiters
